body_html:
Just a little bit more to the story, 0 * -float('inf') yields nan while 0.xx * -float('inf') yields -inf. Maybe this is the expected behavior, but it could really help to hint this somewhere in the doc.
Thanks.

Thanks.
body:
Just a little bit more to the story, `0 * -float('inf')` yields `nan` while `0.xx * -float('inf')` yields `-inf`. Maybe this is the expected behavior, but it could really help to hint this somewhere in the doc. 
Thanks.
